document.title: Browsing tools
document.paragraph:
This sub-category gathers the preferences related to the tools in the left part of EiffelStudio development window. There are four of them: 1
Label in the preferences window Complete description
Maximum number of items in history combo boxes This sets the maximum number of items that will be displayed in the history combo boxes in the
/tools/eiffelstudio/reference/10_browsing_tools/10_address_bars/index.xml address bars . The default value is 10.
Allow class name completion in the address combo boxes This boolean preference enables or disables the completion of names in the combo boxes in the
/tools/eiffelstudio/reference/10_browsing_tools/10_address_bars/index.xml address bars . The default value is True.
Show only one tool. If this is True, only one of the
../../../10_browsing_tools/index.xml browsing tools (i.e. Features, Clusters, Search, Windows and Favorites tools) will be displayed at a time. If it is False up to three tools can be shown simultaneously. The default value is False.
Automatically expand the feature tree If this is True, the
../../../10_browsing_tools/30_feature_tool/10_feature_tree.xml feature tree , which contains feature names sorted by feature clauses, will be expanded so that you can see all the features immediately. If it is False, you will only see the feature clauses at first and have to expand them to reach feature names. The default value is True
